comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: Wealthy American theater actor, producer, boxing promoter, 1863-1950. His 1913 production (with the Schuberts) of "Iolanthe" ran for only 40 performances, May 12-June 14. Nina Napier had the role of Fleta: www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/3437637179/in/p... Entertaining bio from "American Heritage," 1980: www.americanheritage.com/articles/magazine/ah/1980/3/1980... Wikipedia: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/William_A._Brady

comment.author: 34911459@N08
comment._content: Wystan: thanks for finding additional information about William Brady.  We appreciate it.  We'll add it to the record.
